directions: Pulse chiles, garlic, cilantro, parsley, cumin, cardamom, and 1/4 cup oil in a food processor until very finely chopped. Transfer chutney to a medium bowl and mix in remaining 1/2 cup oil; season with salt and pepper.
Do Ahead: Chutney can be made 3 days ahead; cover and chill.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups fresh cilantro leaves with tender stems
1 1/2 cups fresh flat-leaf parsley leaves with tender stems
title: Cilantro-Parsley Chutney
